ITEM.NAME: Weblog (Blog)
ITEM.CODE: !Main Blog [{WeblogEntryPlugin title='New Entry'}] ------ !Entries of the last 30 days [{INSERT WeblogPlugin page='Main' days=30}]

ITEM.CODE:

ITEM.NAME: Recent Changes

This is a list of all pages that were changed during the last 30 days.
[{RecentChangesPlugin since=30}]

ITEM.NAME: Server Date Time
ITEM.CODE: This server lives on [{CurrentTimePlugin format=zzzz}] and the time here is [{CurrentTimePlugin format='HH:mm \'on\' dd-MMM-yyyy'}]
